math.geom2d.dynamic
Interface DynamicObject2D

All Known Subinterfaces:
DynamicMeasure2D, DynamicShape2D, DynamicTransform2D
All Known Implementing Classes:
Angle2Lines2D, AngleMeasure2D, BezierCurve4Points2D, Bisector2Lines2D, Bisector3Points2D, CentroidNPoints2D, Circle2Points2D, Circle3Points2D, CircleArc3Points2D, CircleArcCenter2Points2D, CircleCenter2D, CircleDiameter2D, CircleInversionCircle2D, CirclePointRadius2D, Constant2D, Distance2Points2D, DistanceMeasure2D, DistancePointCurve2D, DynamicLabel2D, Ellipse2Focus2D, Ellipse3Points2D, HorizontalAngleLine2D, Intersection2Circles2D, Intersection2StraightObjects2D, IntersectionLineCircle2D, InvertedBisector2Lines2D, LengthCurve2D, LengthLineSegment2D, LineArc2Points2D, LineSegment2Points2D, LineSymmetryLine2D, MeasureLabel2D, Median2Points2D, MidPoint2Points2D, OrthogonalCircle2D, ParallelLine2D, ParallelLineDistance2D, PerpendicularLine2D, Point2Values2D, PointLocus2D, PointOnCircle2D, PointOnCurve2D, PointOnCurvePosition2D, PointOnEllipse2D, PointOnLine2D, PointRelative3Points2D, PointRelativePoint2D, PointSymmetryPoint2D, PolylineNPoints2D, PolySmoothCurveNCurves2D, RadicalLine2Circles2D, RadiusCircle2D, Ray2Points2D, ReuleauxTriangle2Points2D, Rotation3Points2D, SignedDistancePointCurve2D, StraightLine2Points2D, Tangent2Circles2D, TangentCircleLine2D, TransformedCircle2D, TransformedLineArc2D, TransformedPoint2D
public interface DynamicObject2D

Method Summary
 java.lang.Object[] getAncestors()
          Return the objects whose change directly affect this shape.
 boolean isDefined()
          return true if the object is well defined.
 void update()
          Update inner data of the geometric objects depending on position of ancestors.
 

Method Detail

isDefined

boolean isDefined()
return true if the object is well defined. For example, the intersection point between two lines can be undefined if lines are parallel.

getAncestors

java.lang.Object[] getAncestors()
Return the objects whose change directly affect this shape. Ancestors will mostly be instances of Shape2D, but we can imagine dependance to other kind of objects.

update

void update()
Update inner data of the geometric objects depending on position of ancestors.
